original_text: And five bars for the boards of the other side of the tabernacle, and five bars for the boards of the side of the tabernacle, for the two sides westward.
korean_text: 성막 저쪽 널판을 위하여 다섯 개요 성막 뒤 곧 서쪽 널판을 위하여 다섯 개이며

sentences.original_text: And five bars for the boards
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다섯 개의 막대기가 널판들을 위해

sentences.original_text: of the other side of the tabernacle
and five bars for the boards
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다섯 개의 막대기가 널판들을 위해

sentences.original_text: of the side of the tabernacle
